└─$ cat a_sol_Labobyte.bin a.sol

pragma solidity ^0.8.0;

contract Labobyte {
    fallback() external payable {
        // Allocate 16 bytes in memory
        bytes memory buf = new bytes(16);
        // Encrypted payload
        uint8[16] memory enc = [
            0x4d, 0x43, 0x41, 0x4b,
            0x7e, 0x5e, 0x37, 0x5a,
            0x56, 0x39, 0x45, 0x3c,
            0x4f, 0x27, 0x43, 0x6d
        ];
        // Decrypt each byte: plain = enc ^ (index + 1)
        for (uint i = 0; i < 16; i++) {
            buf[i] = bytes1(enc[i] ^ uint8(i + 1));
        }
        // Return (via REVERT) the 16‑byte plaintext as revert data
        assembly {
            revert(add(buf, 32), 16)
        }
    }
}
